1547980.name: Paco
1547980.description:
Pyro Ascension Control Order (P.A.C.O) is the ministry in charge of fire control and safety. You play as a robot that has become faulty, and is deemed unsafe to the public. The robot, called Paco, has been ordered to be incinerated. Paco must utilize the abilities of a Pyro Ascension robot, in order to escape the incineration facility and earn their freedom.


  • Solve puzzles utilizing Paco's unique gun B.O.U.N.C.E that fires projectiles that shoot Paco and enemies high into the sky

  • Navigate from the incineration chamber of Robot Corp. all the way up to the CEO's office in order to earn Paco's freedom

  • Interact with the other robots in the facility, that may choose to aid or hinder Paco, depending on your choices

  • Discover clues about Robot Corp. and the real reason why Paco was ordered to be destroyed
1547980.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
